name: Google Contacts Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Contacts Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Contacts API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Contacts API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many contacts

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: eventsUi (值: None) - An event related to the person
fileAs (值: None) - The name that should be used to sort the person in a list
group (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

fields.name: fields
fields.description: A field mask to restrict which fields on each person are returned. Multiple fields can be specified by separating them with commas.
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: A field mask to restrict which fields on each person are returned. Multiple fields can be specified by separating them with commas. | 默认值: []

rawData.name: rawData
rawData.description: Whether to return the data exactly in the way it got received from the API
rawData.natural_language_description: 参数名: RAW Data | 作用: Whether to return the data exactly in the way it got received from the API | 默认值: False

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

useQuery.name: useQuery
useQuery.description: Whether or not to use a query to filter the results
useQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Query | 作用: Whether or not to use a query to filter the results | 默认值: False

query.name: query
query.description: The plain-text query for the request. The query is used to match prefix phrases of the fields on a person. For example, a person with name "foo name" matches queries such as "f", "fo", "foo", "foo n", "nam", etc., but not "oo n".
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The plain-text query for the request. The query is used to match prefix phrases of the fields on a person. For example, a person with name "foo name" matches queries such as "f", "fo", "foo", "foo n", "nam", etc., but not "oo n".

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sortOrder (值: None) - The order of the contacts returned in the result

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: etag (值: None) - The etag field in the person is nedded to make sure the contact has not changed since your last read
eventsUi (值: None) - An event related to the person
fileAs (值: None) - The name that should be used to sort the person in a list
group (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
